message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1200000 to you, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable piece to you at a special price of $950000. This is a unique chance to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
